Posts.Content: Hi,  Was wondering the same, had mastectomy 3 weeks ago, hv 2 hv delayed reconstruction, my other breast has become itchy and am getting pains in my back behind shouldee blade, feel silly going drs if this is normal,  Love n peace ❤
Posts.Title: Back & rib pain 3 weeks post mastectomy/reconstruction..is that normal...

Posts.Content: Hi all, Was finally diagnosed last week with stage 2 bc, relieved i finally know what it is and totally shocked that i have it  will be having a mastectomy after easter but not to have reconstruction until a later date which is worrying me a bit. This alone is making me anxious and making me overthink things, ie has it spread, are they expecting it to spread!  When i was told i had bc i couldnt really take it all in, my designated nurse to chat to is on holiday and i dont want to bother the dr with questions.  I feel im putting a brave face on for family members and friends who ask if im feeling ok, my answer,  yes feeling fine, when im actually feeling overwhelmed with a mixture of emotions, is this normal?  Also bc in left breast and nodes but am feeling pain under right arm also
Posts.Title: Anxious
